categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Gilded Claw was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer of the Imperial Navy. By 8 ABY, it was assigned to defend Kuat Drive Yards.

The warship was left as a drifting hulk after engaging Warlord Zsinj's Iron Fist during the Battle of Kuat. The Gilded Claw was unable to prevent Zsinj's rogue forces from stealing the newly completed Executor-class Star Dreadnought Razor's Kiss.
